metadata.title: CVE-2024-56752 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/nouveau/gr/gf100: Fix missing unlock in gf100_gr_chan_new()When the call to gf100_grctx_generate() fails, unlock gr->fecs.mutexbefore returning the error.Fixes smatch warning:drivers/gpu/drm/nouveau/nvkm/engine/gr/gf100.c:480 gf100_gr_chan_new()warn: inconsistent returns '&gr->fecs.mutex'.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
